mapper.select:
SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.farm.mapper.FarmerEducationInfoMapper.selectfarmerEducationInfo */ CM.FRMER_SN , CM.BZOB_RGNO , CM.EDU_COS_CD , CM.NAME , CM.EDU_ORG_NM , CM.EDU_COS_NM , CM.EDU_STR_DT , CM.EDU_END_DT , CM.CNFM_YN , CM.DEL_YN , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID FROM TB_EDU_FNSH_INFO CM WHERE 1=1
AND CM.FRMER_SN LIKE #{frmerSn} || '%'
AND CM.BZOB_RGNO LIKE '%' || #{bzobRgno} || '%'
ORDER BY CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT DESC

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.farm.mapper.FarmerEducationInfoMapper.selectfarmerEducationInfoList */ CM.FRMER_SN , CM.BZOB_RGNO , CM.EDU_COS_CD , CM.NAME , CM.EDU_ORG_NM , CM.EDU_COS_NM , CM.EDU_STR_DT , CM.EDU_END_DT , CM.CNFM_YN , CM.DEL_YN , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID FROM TB_EDU_FNSH_INFO CM WHERE 1=1
AND CM.FRMER_SN LIKE #{frmerSn} || '%'
AND CM.BZOB_RGNO LIKE '%' || #{bzobRgno} || '%'
ORDER BY CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT DESC
